pages.title: Tatooine
pages.text: At first sight, this planet does not look very hospitable as it's just desert, but after a few small observations, you can find some villages of people native to this planet, and some structures different from what you can see on Earth (Once the dev has added them â˜»)

pages.title: Entities
pages.text: Tatooine is home to several entities. So far, only two have been identified by the great explorers : $(br)$(li) The Jawa$(br)$(li) The Bantha
The Bantha is a passive mob that live in the desert. You can mount them by giving them wheat
Jawas are passive creatures that lives in big structures named 'Jawa Crawlers'. They are attracted by mechanical items and you can trade items with them !
